title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin [2001][DvdRip][Eng] - SaiyanWarrior
description:
Movie Description:

In 1941, Italy allies with Germany and ruthlessly conquers the 
much weaker country of Greece. On a remote Greek island, an 
Italian artillery garrison is established to maintain order. 
One Italian officer, Captain Corelli, adopts an attitude of 
mutual co-existence with the Greeks and engages in such 
activities as music festivals and courting the daughter of a 
local doctor. In 1943, however, after Italy surrenders to the 
Allies and changes sides in the war, Captain Corelli must 
defend the Greek island against a German invasion.
